summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNED A 2016 KEYSTONE FUZION. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 18V651000 (SERVICE BRAKES, ELECTRIC). THE CONTACT NOTICED A STRONG BRAKE ODOR WHILE DRIVING. THE CONTACT LOST THE BRAKING ABILITY AND CAUSED THE REV TO GO INTO AND EMBANKMENT DESTROYING THE FRONT AND REAR AXLE AND THE FRAME WAS BENT. THE RV WAS DESTROYED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 7,000.
